Saxmundham Mobile Library Route 2

Contact us:

Manager: Helen Hudson and Peter Fiske

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
2A Rendlesham Village Centre 0935 – 1035
2B Rendlesham Friday Street 1040 – 1055
2C Eyke School 1100 – 1110
2D Bromeswell Church 1120 – 1135
2E Sutton Heath Estate Shop Car Park 1150 – 1210
2F Melton St Andrew’s Place 1220 – 1235
2G Ufford Parklands 1240 – 1250
2H Parham Notice board 1410 – 1425
2I Parham North Green 1430 – 1500
2J Cransford Oaklands 1505 – 1520
2K Rendham Bruisyard Road 1535 – 1550

Calling every 4 weeks on Wednesdays:

2016: 13 January, 10 February, 9 March, 6 April, 4 May, 1 June, 29 June, 27 July, 24 August, 21 September, 19 October, 16 November, 14 December
